attachments.fallback: [March 26th, 2021 10:22 AM] colinxs: Is anyone here familiar with Nix/Guix? I'm trying to better understand the difference in approaches taking by Nix/Guix and BinaryBuilder, especially in the context of (1) patching binaries and (2) the handling of machine-specific libs like libGL.
attachments.text: Is anyone here familiar with Nix/Guix? I'm trying to better understand the difference in approaches taking by Nix/Guix and BinaryBuilder, especially in the context of (1) patching binaries and (2) the handling of machine-specific libs like libGL.

[October 13th, 2020 11:21 PM] mose: Part of the idea of artifacts is to have them immutable, for consistency.

What's the problem with NixOS?
